OOC: It is illegal for one character to fire more than 25 shots per post.  
You fired 30.  Please change the post.

:::Banzai-Tron:::

::Banzai-Tron gets hit by the rockets, blowing him backwards::
Banzai-Tron: Grrr.  You shall DIE! GOODBYE CAPTAIN FEARO!
::he fires 2 missles at the connected Lokk and Axis::

--part1_c0.147ddee2.2838867a_boundary
